main event: A radar sighting of a green colored object with a diffused under-trail was reported on 2 January 1955 at Campus-West Kentucky Col.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 4-5 minutes,The object approached and then retreated,Observable under-trail of the object was noted,The report prompted further investigation by the authorities,There were multiple witnesses, including a pastor and his family, during other sightings mentioned in the document.
sighted object: one green colored object with a slightly discernible trail
witness description: a pastor, his family, and four other adults
